The video clip of Rahul Gandhi: s speech: The expert's verdict mentions that the claim is based on a video clip of Rahul Gandhi's speech where he allegedly referred to Bhupesh Baghel as the CM of Madhya Pradesh. This video clip serves as evidence to verify the authenticity of the claim.
BJP leader: s tweet: The expert's verdict mentions that the claim was tweeted by BJP leader Shivraj Singh Chouhan along with the video clip. The tweet serves as another aspect to verify the claim, as it shows that the claim has been made by a prominent political figure.
Retweet by Union Minister Smriti Irani: The expert's verdict mentions that the tweet by Shivraj Singh Chouhan was retweeted by Union Minister Smriti Irani. This retweet by another influential political figure adds credibility to the claim and serves as another aspect to verify its authenticity.
Rahul Gandhi: s speech transcript: The expert's verdict provides a transcript of Rahul Gandhi's speech where he mentions the names of the Chief Ministers of Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh. This transcript serves as a direct source to verify whether Rahul Gandhi actually referred to Bhupesh Baghel as the CM of Madhya Pradesh.
